scripts.cypress:prepare-prod: npm run start:nw & npx wait-on http://localhost:3000/learn && bash changed_md_files.sh
scripts.cypress:prep-report: npx mochawesome-merge --reportDir cypress/report/mochawesome-report > cypress/report/mochawesome.json && ps -ef | grep docusaurus-start | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill
scripts.cypress:e2e: npm run cypress:prepare-prod && npm run cypress:prod && npm run cypress:prep-report
